body:
System requirements macOS 11 Big Sur or later Installation Download dmg file from here. Open a downloaded dmg file. Move Tinkle.app into Applications. Open Tinkle from Launchpad. Accessibility Access dialog will be shown.
Click the Open System Settings button.
(Tinkle uses the accessibility features in order to detect the focused window changes.) Enable Tinkle on System Settings > Privacy & Security > Accessibility. Finished!
A visual effect is shown when you change the focused window while Tinkle is running.
What’s next? Configuration

Tinkle keeps running in the background even if you close Settings.
To quit Tinkle, choose “Quit Tinkle” from menu bar.
Note If you’ve hidden the menu bar icon, you can also quit Tinkle from Settings.
Open Settings. Press Quit Tinkle button.
